value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...And that's everything I know about
what's going on. Everything I know
about the Tempest...$k$pSo I beseech you, Heroes... Please,
lend me your strength so we can
restore—$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|Hmph.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Is that you, Brave Hero? It is!$k$pPlease, wait! If it's money you want,
I...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|I'm not here to rob you, if that's what
you think. Guess I can't blame you
after last year.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Whoa! Hi there, Marth! It's good to
see you again. Ready to get going?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Another Brave Hero... I am glad to
see you again, Mia. Truly, I am...so
grateful...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Aw, that's no reason to cry, Marth!
Stop that sniffling!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|I sense a sinister presence. I can't
ignore that, so I'll join you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロゼロ,ch05_11_Zero_M_Halloween18,Face|I wonder what sort of mischief awaits
us in the depths of the Tempest...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Halloween18,Face|Though I must return to my liege's
side with all haste, I will join you in
fighting this evil.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Seems like everybody's raring to go!
Time's wasting. Let's get a move on!$k$pC'mon, you big ox!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|Guess that's how it is.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thanks to all of your efforts, this
realm is safe. You have my thanks.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_F_Halloween18,Face|I no longer sense anything sinister
here. Everything is all right.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Halloween18,Face|I must complete my mission.
Farewell.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロゼロ,ch05_11_Zero_M_Halloween18,Face|Yes... If something were to happen to
Lord Leo while I was gone... I guess
that's it for me, kids.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest has been stilled for
now. Everyone will return to their
own realms...$k$pI know it must be this way, but it is
always hard to say good-bye to
Heroes. I hope we might meet again.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|Speaking of which...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|That guy Joshua told me he's hoping
to run into you again. He said
something about a bet you made...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Did he? I...see. Well, I must be on my
way! Farewell, Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Halloween18,Face|...$k$pTurned tail and ran...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Halloween18,Face|Hahaha! I hope we meet again!$k$p
